RNS Number : 7573A
3i Group PLC
03 June 2021
 

Market Abuse Regulation

 

MAR Article 19

 

On 1 June 2021, 3i Group plc (the "Company") was notified of the following.  

 

On 1 June 2021 share awards under the 3i Group Deferred Bonus Plan (the "Plan") held by Simon Borrows, a Director and person discharging managerial responsibilities ("PDMR") vested.  On that date 126,037 ordinary shares of 73 19/22p each (ISIN: GB00B1YW4409) in the Company ("Shares") ceased to be subject to restrictions under the Plan.

 

On 1 June 2021 share awards under the Plan held by the PDMRs named in the table below vested.  On that date the Shares shown in the column headed "Shares acquired" ceased to be subject to restrictions under the Plan.  The Shares shown in the column headed "Shares sold" were sold on 1 June 2021 at a price of 1256.34 pence per share.
